roleset.name: to impose or collect

role.descr: levied on what? entity being taxed

example.name: levy-v: transitive
example.text: Still , Hugo 's impact may revive unsuccessful proposals to give local governments authority to levy sales taxes .

example.name: levy-v: With Arg 2
example.text: Specific measures might include raising the highway tax and aviation fuel tax , as well as levying special taxes on appliances that consume excessive resources .

propbank.arg: on appliances that consume excessive resources

example.name: levy-n: args 0 and 2
example.text: an erroneous IRS levy on a bank account

example.name: levy-n: arg 1 as a type of tax
example.text: The petroleum gain levy on sales

roleset.note: LEVY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'levy' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from levy.01-v predicate notes)
LEVY-N NOTES: Based on ontonotes nouns. Comparison to levy.01-v. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from levy.01-n)
